reviews.review_msg: Attend tutorials and lecture review days!!! Hard work pays off, exams are extremely fair but remember everyone does well, keeping up with material really helps especially in tutorial

I don't think I ever saw Dr. Northwood in a bad mood once. She's super friendly and easy to engage with. Her lectures are very digestible. Her grading was a little on the difficult side. Some tests she tried to make "easier" but wound up making them harder; at least for me and I may or may not be stupid lol. She was super clear about final material
great prof in MBB courses, i have taken 321,322 with Northwood, grades obtained are good and fair. Easy workload, attendance matters to good grade.

Northwood is a pretty knowledgeable professor and creates a fun/relaxed environment. She relates material to real world stuff if you don't like the usual bland mbb material. Super clear on what's on the exam and so tests are relatively easy with the averages being around 76%.
awesome prof....very helpful, very to the point
Hilarious, hysterical, sometimes indecisive. Good prof, though.

CRAP professor! She teaches you nothing. All you have to do is memorize what she tells you will be on the exam. You get nothing from taking a course with her. Her advising abilites are questionable and she treats students with disrespect, especially if you are not in MBB!!
Nice lady, a bit scatter brained.  Tells what to know/what not to know for exams.  Exams made up of many short answer questions, so really memorize everything she says to.

she tells u what u need to know for the exam..and that's what u really need to concentrate on in terms of exam prep...everything she covered has been straight memorization as it is mostly the case in other mbb courses
Her exams are very easy: short answer (one word to one sentence) questions.  And she tells you EXACTLY what will be on the exam - no suprises.
